Not So Localhost

I’ve spent years building side projects that never left localhost. This blog is my declaration of war on that habit—maybe on yours too.

I’m not here to tell you how to do things right. It's not about perfection—it’s about progress. The real fun begins when you build, break and ship things. ハッカ
